name: Atlas Network Powered by NodeOps
description: The first DePIN Orchestration Layer. The Atlas Network marketplace will bring together a diverse group of compute infrastructure providers, from solo validators to decentralized compute and centralized compute providers, along with various restaking platforms like EigenLayer, Babylon, Solayer, and others to bring crypto-economic security to this pool of providers and the different kinds of nodes (and other deployable like ML models) for protocols across verticals(Gaming, AI, DePIN, and others) under one roof
